titleStmt.title: Tvvo sermons, upon that great embassie of our Lord and Sauiour Iesus Christ recorded by his Euangelist, Saint Matthew, Chap. 10.V.16. Preached by Iohn Scull, an humble professor and minister of the word.
titleStmt.author: Scull, John, minister of the word.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
